newsitem.title: FRANCE: Rhone assets sales six billion Ffr.
newsitem.headline: Rhone assets sales six billion Ffr.

text.p: Rhone-Poulenc said on Friday that by September 30 it had sold six billion francs in non-strategic assets, out of its planned 10 billion franc divestment programme.
The company said in a results statement that the ratio of net debt to equity had been brought down to 0.63, versus 0.72 at the end of 1995.
